lead_paragraph: With injured All-Star Michael Brantley likely out for the first portion of the season, the Cleveland Indians spent plenty of time this offseason looking for ways to fill the large hole he'll leave in the outfield.

headline.print_headline: Indians' Almonte Suspended 80 Games for Failed Drug Test
headline.main: Indians' Almonte Suspended 80 Games for Failed Drug Test
